description: In this course Lex provides a number of his own tips suitable for both novices and experienced traders. This may not seem like a lot, as together they comprise just over an hour of material. However, if you follow each of these tips, you will be in the top 1% of traders in the world. Trading is not about reinventing the wheel - it is about watching others, and then taking the good while leaving the bad.
title: Trading Tips from Hedge Fund Manager
